header.title: AI Creative Suite
header.subtitle: Your all-in-one suite for storyboards, image generation, media analysis, and audio creation.

footer.poweredBy: Powered by Google Gemini API. Generated content is for creative reference.

userStatus.proTooltip: You are on the PRO plan. Click to switch to FREE.
userStatus.freeTooltip: Click to upgrade to the PRO plan.

proModal.title: Upgrade to PRO
proModal.subtitle: Enter your PRO access code to unlock all features.
proModal.error: Invalid access code. Please try again.
proModal.contact: To request an upgrade, please contact:

storyboardGenerator.title: Storyboard Generator
storyboardGenerator.subtitle: Transform your creative ideas into detailed, multi-scene storyboards with AI-generated visuals and professional shot descriptions.

form.ideaPlaceholder: e.g., A lone astronaut discovering a glowing forest on a distant moon.
form.referenceImageHint: Pro users can upload up to 10 images. Free users can upload up to 3.
form.referenceImageCostHint: +5 credits per extra image (first is free).
form.coherenceHint: Each new scene's image will be based on the previous one.
form.coherenceTooltipPro: Ensures consistent results. Included with PRO.
form.coherenceTooltipFree: Enabling this adds 5 credits to the cost of each generated scene.
form.aspectRatioHint: Choose the format for your generated images.
form.submitHint: Press Ctrl+Enter or Cmd+Enter to submit
form.refImageModeHint: How should we use these images?
form.refImageModeContextualHint: Analyze all images for context, use first image as visual seed for Scene 1.
form.refImageModeCombineHint: Merge all images into a new, single image for Scene 1. (+{{cost}} credits)

results.downloadErrorCredits: Not enough credits. Downloading the storyboard zip costs {{DOWNLOAD_COST}} credits.

generator.errorImageLimit: You can upload a maximum of {{maxImages}} reference images.
generator.errorInvalidNumbers: Please enter valid, positive numbers for duration and scene count.
generator.errorNotEnoughCredits: Not enough credits. This action costs {{totalCreditCost}} credits, but you only have {{userCredits}}.
generator.errorUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the console.
generator.errorRegenCredits: Not enough credits to regenerate. You need {{creditCost}} credits.
generator.errorRegenFailed: Failed to regenerate image for Scene {{index}}: {{errorMessage}}
generator.errorUploadFailed: Failed to use uploaded image for Scene {{index}}: {{errorMessage}}
generator.loadingMessage: Generating storyboard and scene images... This may take a moment.

imageStudio.title: Image Studio
imageStudio.subtitle: A conversational interface to generate, edit, and combine images. Your creative chat for visual ideation.
imageStudio.introMessage:
Hello! I'm your creative partner. Here's how to use the Image Studio:

1. **Generate**: Just type a prompt to create a new image from scratch.
2. **Edit**: Upload **one** image and type instructions to modify it.
3. **Combine**: Upload **multiple** images and describe how to merge them.

**Credit Costs per Action:**
- **Generate**: {{gen_pro}} (PRO) / {{gen_free}} (Free)
- **Edit**: {{edit_pro}} (PRO) / {{edit_free}} (Free)
- **Combine**: {{combine_pro}} (PRO) / {{combine_free}} (Free)
imageStudio.placeholder: Describe an image or type an edit instruction...
imageStudio.errorNoPromptForImages: Please add a prompt to describe how to edit or combine your image(s).
imageStudio.errorCredits: Not enough credits. This action costs {{cost}} credits, but you only have {{userCredits}}.
imageStudio.errorImageLimit: You can upload a maximum of {{max}} images.

mediaAnalyzer.title: Media Analyzer
mediaAnalyzer.subtitle: Upload images or videos to get detailed analyses or generate replication scripts for your own creative projects.
mediaAnalyzer.promptPlaceholder: e.g., What is the main subject of this image?
mediaAnalyzer.thinkingModeHint: For complex videos, enable deeper analysis. This may take longer.
mediaAnalyzer.thinkingModeTooltipFree: Enabling this adds 40 credits to the cost of video analysis.
mediaAnalyzer.errorFile: Please upload a file to analyze.
mediaAnalyzer.errorPrompt: Please enter a prompt for image analysis.
mediaAnalyzer.errorCredits: Not enough credits. This action costs {{cost}} credits, but you only have {{userCredits}}.

audioLab.title: Audio Lab
audioLab.subtitle: Bring your text to life. Generate high-quality speech with emotion and character.
audioLab.customVoiceDescription: Provide an audio sample of a voice. We'll analyze its characteristics and apply them to your text.
audioLab.uploadAudioLabel: Upload Audio Sample (5-10s, no background noise)
audioLab.placeholder: Enter text to generate audio. Use cues like 'Say excitedly:' or '(laughs)' to guide the performance.
audioLab.errorCredits: Not enough credits. This action costs {{cost}} credits, but you only have {{userCredits}}.
audioLab.errorEmptyText: Please enter some text to generate audio.
audioLab.errorNoCustomVoiceFile: Please upload or record a custom voice audio sample.
audioLab.auditionText: Hello, you can use my voice to bring your text to life.
audioLab.errorPreviewCredits: Not enough credits. Preview costs {{cost}} credit(s).
audioLab.recordVoiceDescription: Click the button to start recording a 5-10 second sample. Speak clearly in a quiet environment.
audioLab.errorMicrophone: Microphone access was denied. Please enable it in your browser settings to use this feature.
audioLab.micPermissionDeniedDescription: You have blocked microphone access. To enable recording, please go to your browser's site settings (usually via the lock icon in the address bar) and allow microphone access for this page.

pricing.title: Find the perfect plan
pricing.subtitle: Start for free and scale up as you grow. All plans include access to our powerful AI models.

freePlan.name: Free
freePlan.description: A generous free tier to get you started.
freePlan.feature_audio_lab_cost_custom: Custom voice replication (100 credits + generation cost)

proPlan.name: PRO
proPlan.description: Unlock the full suite of creative tools.
proPlan.feature3: Heavily discounted rates on all actions:
proPlan.feature4_detail: Coherence, Enhanced Analysis, Downloads, and Editing
proPlan.feature_audio_lab: Audio Lab access with discounted rates
proPlan.feature_audio_lab_cost_custom: Custom voice replication (50 credits + generation cost)
